page.title:
Defining “Co-Occurring Disorders”
Defining “Co-Occurring Disorders”
page.normal_text:
The presence of at least two disorders:
The presence of at least two disorders:
page.enlisting:
▪ One being substance abuse or dependence ▪ The other being a DSM-IV major mental

page.title:
Rates of Substance Abuse or Dependence Among Inmates with Mental Problems
Rates of Substance Abuse or
Dependence Among Inmates with
Mental Problems
page.normal_text:
74% of state prisoners with mental problems also have substance abuse or dependence problems
74% of state prisoners with mental
problems also have substance abuse or
dependence problems

(U.S. Department of Justice, 2006)
(U.S. Department of Justice, 2006)
